function.name: Weather
function.description: Get the current weather for a given location.

location.description: The city and state, e.g. San Francisco, CA

function.name: TimeZoneConverter
function.description: Converts a specific date and time from one time zone to another.

time_string.description: The date and time to convert (ISO 8601 format). If omitted, uses current system time.

source_tz.description: The source time zone (IANA format, e.g., 'America/New_York', 'UTC').

target_tz.description: The target time zone (IANA format, e.g., 'Europe/London', 'Asia/Tokyo').

function.name: ConversionCalculator
function.description: Converts values between different units of measurement (temperature, length, weight, volume).

function.name: SystemTime
function.description: Get the current system date and time.

function.name: FetchURL
function.description: Fetches the raw text content from a specific URL.

url.description: The URL to fetch content from.

function.name: CurrencyConverter
function.description: Converts an amount from one currency to another using real-time rates.

from_currency.description: Source currency code (e.g., USD, EUR, JPY).

to_currency.description: Target currency code (e.g., EUR, GBP, CAD).

function.name: SaveReminder
function.description: Saves a reminder or calendar event.

time.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 preferred). If omitted, uses current time.

function.name: CheckCalendar
function.description: Checks the calendar for events. Can check a specific date or list upcoming events.

date.description: The date to check (YYYY-MM-DD). If omitted, returns upcoming events.

function.name: SendEmail
function.description: Sends an email to a specified recipient using the configured SMTP server.

function.name: YouTubeTranscript
function.description: Fetches the transcript of a YouTube video given its URL.

url.description: The URL of the YouTube video.

function.name: WikipediaLookup
function.description: Searches for and retrieves summaries or full text from Wikipedia articles.

mode.description: Whether to retrieve just the summary (intro) or the full article text. Defaults to 'summary'.

function.name: ArXivSearch
function.description: Search ArXiv for academic papers and research papers.

query.description: The search query (keywords, topics, paper titles).

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default 5, max 20).

function.name: SetGoal
function.description: Sets a new goal for the agent to work on.

description.description: The goal description - what should be achieved.

goal_id.description: The ID of the goal to mark as complete.
